item.title: Hi there ! ~
item.description: My name is Ruben Rodriguez, a geek samurai passionate about technology! I am a Cloud Infrastructure engineer and DevOps advocate with 5 years of working experience, passionate about Cloud native technologies and the CNCF (Cloud Native Computing Foundation) Landscape projects (https://landscape.cncf.io), open source and Linux user since I was 14. I love to design and implement solutions that support development teams to deploy applications fast and realiably, including CI/CD pipelines, Kubernetes workloads, monitoring & observability and messaging systems (RabbitMQ, Kafka, etc).
